snippet.title: Amber Heard Blame Shifting | ft. Leslee Powers
snippet.description:
This is part of of my Amber Heard vs Johnny Depp series with Leslee Powers.  In today's show we will discuss examples of blame shifting and how Amber Heard has been doing this in the latest court case. Leslee has a series where she has been covering the details of the court transcripts.  In this episode Leslee Powers from Spiritually Empowered Coaching comes back to discuss examples of Amber Heard using blame shifting to propitiate her stories.  Leslee gives us an update on the recent court ruling.  We then discuss the importance of the $7M donation that no one can find documentation on.  Duane then talks about the different types of blame shifting.  They then tackle the question if Amber really knows she did anything wrong and what happens when you back a toxic person into a corner.  Leslee talks about how people ask her, “how do you know who to believe?”  Duane and Leslee then discuss how these people WANT something from their targets.  Finally they wrap up with talking about the importance of watching and believing the patterns of behaviors.

❋ Leslee Powers - [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsEaTDlh3kfgl17DnaRFW2g]

🎙 You Get To Be YOU This Time - Podcast Series
https://yougettobeyou.com/duane

To call into the show
☎ 1-424-373-5483 or 1-424-DSD-LIVE

International Calling use this for free calling
❋ https://www.callinstudio.com/show/dsdlive

Sign up for text notifications
☎ Text "DSDLIVE" to (844) 598-0012

☎ For one on one coaching - https://www.dadsurvivingdivorce.com/coaching/

❋ Become a channel member! - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUXEHz3OECVwLz1X-SNM4lw/join

📖  Table of Contents
00:00 - Start of show
02:03 - What is blame shifting
03:09 - Update with the recent court ruling
04:49 - Where did the $7m “donation” go?
11:18 - Arguing about the argument
15:54 - Curating the “story”
18:10 - You actually said that to Mr. Depp?
19:47 - Audience poll - experience or interest
20:47 - Does Amber really know she did something wrong?
23:29 - Backing a toxic person in a corner
26:06 - The trained DV officers are lying
32:02 - But he gets intoxicated and blacks out
35:33 - Projecting confidence
39:07 - How do you know who to believe?
42:50 - How often will the abused “go after” the abuser?
45:18 - When there are no kids do abusers leave you alone?
48:10 - Amber wanted something from Johnny
50:24 - When the stories just don’t add up
52:29 - Minimizing the feelings
55:35 - The patterns of behavior
59:19 - End of show wrap-up

⚠️DISCLAIMER - Links used in this description are affiliate links and if used a small commission will help support this channel.  Use of these links do not change the cost of the items purchased.

⚠️DISCLAIMER - I am not a therapist,  licensed counselor, or attorney.  My thoughts are my own opinions from my personal experience.  You should consult a professional when you are changing your treatment or making legal decisions.  This channel and companion website are for informational purposes only.
